definition: appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
four horse military chariot (archaic)/four (archaic)/generic term for history books
to ride/to mount/to make use of/to avail oneself of/to take advantage of/to multiply (math.)/Buddhist sect or creed

sentences.english: What happens when multiply this with the vector X?
sentences.chinese: 我們把它和向量X相乘會怎樣？

sentences.english: If the energies add, then the partition functions multiply each other.
sentences.chinese: 能量相加，配分函數相乘。

sentences.english: OK, now we know how to multiply matrices.
sentences.chinese: 好，現在我們知道怎麼把兩個矩陣相乘了。

sentences.english: You multiply them, all three, + and that's a plus sign.
sentences.chinese: 把這三個都相乘，符號爲。

sentences.english: You can just multiply a normal vector by any constant, you will still get the normal vector.
sentences.chinese: 一個法向量與任意常數相乘，還是法向量。

sentences.english: And now we can plug in q1 and q2.
sentences.chinese: 現在我們就能使q1和q2相乘了。

sentences.english: And then, for each little piece, you take the value of a function, and you multiply by the width of a piece.
sentences.chinese: 對每個小段，用函數的值，與那一小段的長度相乘。

sentences.english: Can we multiply anything by anything?
sentences.chinese: 我們可以把任意兩個相乘嗎？

sentences.english: To divide by a fraction, flip the fraction and multiply .
sentences.chinese: 要除以一個分式，就需要把除式顛倒後相乘。
兩個矢量組件對應相乘。

sentences.english: He also showed how one can make sense of adding and multiplying infinities.
sentences.chinese: 他還演示瞭如何能理解將各種無窮大相加和相乘。

sentences.english: Any number times 1 remains the same.
sentences.chinese: 一個數和1相乘，還得原數。

sentences.english: One can make 18 by multiplying 3 and 6 (together).
Today we are going to learn how to multiply two numbers together.
sentences.chinese: 今天我們來學習如何將兩數相乘。

sentences.english: And whereas the energies of the degrees of freedom add up, the partition functions get multiplied.
sentences.chinese: 不同自由度的能量要相加，相應的配分函數要相乘。

definition: to square a number/to calculate the square
